text: kya tumhen isapar aashchary ho raha hai ki tumhaare paalanahaar kee shiksha, tumheen mein se ek purush dvaara tumhaare paas aa gaee hai, taaki vah tumhen saavadhaan kare? tatha yaad karo ki allaah ne noohî€¼ kee jaati ke pashchaat tumhen dharatee mein adhikaar diya hai aur tumhen adhik shaareerik bal diya hai. atah allaah ke puraskaaron ko yaad[1] karo. sambhavatah tum saphal ho jaoge
